item.title: IPwnKit DEFCON CTF 26 Qualification Round
item.description: IPwnKit Come and take a bite of the Apple! We have reserved you a very special place at the WWPC (World Wide Pwning Conference). Email ipwnkit@gmail.com to RSVP and we will reply with your invite. Come, test your skills, and win pwn2ooown!!! Fine print: sw_vers 17E202. The VM will be reset between exploit attempts. If you panic the kernel and don’t walk away with the flag, you are BANNED FROM THIS CHALLENGE, so make it count!
